net.jawr.web.servlet
Class JawrRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.servlet.JawrRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ConfigChangeListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
JawrImageRequestHandler
public class JawrRequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigChangeListener, java.io.Serializable

Request handling class. Any jawr enabled servlet delegates to this class to handle requests.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

JawrRequestHandler

public JawrRequestHandler(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                          javax.servlet.ServletConfig config)
                   throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Reads the properties file and initializes all configuration using the ServletConfig object. If applicable, a ConfigChangeListenerThread will be started to listen to changes in the properties configuration.

Parameters:
servletContext - ServletContext
servletConfig - ServletConfig
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if an exception occurs

JawrRequestHandler

public JawrRequestHandler(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                          java.util.Map initParams,
                          java.util.Properties configProps)
                   throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Alternate constructor that does not need a ServletConfig object. Parameters normally read from it are read from the initParams Map, and the configProps are used instead of reading a .properties file.

Parameters:
servletContext - ServletContext
servletConfig - ServletConfig
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if an exception occurs

doGet

public void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
           throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                  java.io.IOException
Handles a resource request by getting the requested path from the request object and invoking processRequest.

Parameters:
request - the request
response - the response
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if a servlet exception occurs
java.io.IOException - if an IO exception occurs.

processRequest

public void processRequest(java.lang.String requestedPath,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                           java.io.IOException
Handles a resource request.
  • If the request contains an If-Modified-Since header, the 304 status is set and no data is written to the response
  • If the requested path begins with the gzip prefix, a gzipped version of the resource is served, with the corresponding content-encoding header.
  • Otherwise, the resource is written as text to the response.
  • If the resource is not found, the response satus is set to 404 and no response is written.

Parameters:
requestedPath - the requested path
request - the request
response - the response
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if a servlet exception occurs
java.io.IOException - if an IO exception occurs
